entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Vanier
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 1:24 p.m. EDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow mixed with rain. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow at times mixed with rain beginning early this afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h this afternoon. High plus 3. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow mixed with rain. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow or rain ending overnight then cloudy. Fog patches dissipating near midnight. Snowfall amount 2 cm over northern sections. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Monday 3 April 2023
